abstract: Duke Energy agrees to $2.5 million settlement with Virginia over coal ash spill in Dan River.
lead_paragraph: Duke Energy agreed to the settlement with Virginia over a spill that coated 70 miles of the Dan River in gray sludge.

headline.main: Virginia: Duke Agrees to Pay $2.5. Million for Ash Spill
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Duke Agrees to Pay $2.5 Million for Ash Spill

snippet: Duke Energy agreed to the settlement with Virginia over a spill that coated 70 miles of the Dan River in gray sludge.
